original_text: He may cause you to have pain, but he will make you well again. He may hurt you, but he will also give you health. He may cause you to have pain,
korean_text: 하나님은 아프게 하시다가 싸매시며 상하게 하시다가 그의 손으로 고치시나니

sentences.original_text: He may cause you to have pain
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신에게 고통을 줄 수 있지만

sentences.original_text: but he will make you well again
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다시 당신을 낫게 할 것입니다
그는 당신을 다치게 할 수 있지만

sentences.original_text: but he will also give you health
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 당신에게 건강을 줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He may cause you to have pain
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신에게 고통을 줄 수 있습니다
